name: find_countries
description: Find countries' infomation, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known countries.

currencyCode.description: Let api return countries supporting this currency.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

sort_by.description: How to sort countries. Format: 'SORT_FIELD_1,SORT_FIELD_2,...',where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

namePrefix.description: Let api return countries whose names start with this prefix.

name: find_places
description: Find places, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known places.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

sort_by.description: How to sort countries. Format: 'SORT_FIELD_1,SORT_FIELD_2,...',where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

namePrefix.description: Let api return entities whose names start with this prefix.

location.description: Only places near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD.

radius.description: The location radius within which to find places.

minPopulation.description: Let api return entities having at least this population.

maxPopulation.description: Let api return entities having no more than this population.

name: find_regions
description: Find places, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known places.

countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

namePrefix.description: Let api return entities whose names start with this prefix.

name: get_country_details
description: Get country details such as number of regions.

countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id.

name: get_place_details
description: Get place details such as location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).

name: get_region_details
description: Get country region details such as number of cities.

countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id.

regionCode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code.

name: get_currencies
description: Find currencies, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known currencies.

countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

name: get_time_zone_date_time
description: Get the time based on the time zone.

name: get_university_infomation
description: Get university information by its name or country.

name.description: Keywords in the name of the university.

country.description: The country where the university is located.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
